title: FlavorFusion
description: FlavorFusion is a modern and responsive recipe discovery web application that allows users to search for recipes based on available ingredients. It features advanced filtering options including cuisine type, cooking time, dietary preferences, and difficulty level. The platform displays detailed recipe information such as ingredients, step-by-step instructions, images, and nutritional data, along with a favorites system powered by Local Storage for personalized meal planning.
